settings.hero_title: Get Authentic Book Reviews from Our Million+ Reader Community
settings.hero_subtitle: Built through Facebook and Google advertising, our verified ARC community delivers honest, authentic reviews to help your book succeed on Amazon.

settings.section_title: Our Million+ Strong ARC Reader Community
settings.section_subtitle: Built through strategic Facebook and Google advertising, our community delivers authentic reviews that drive real results.
settings.feature_1_description: Every reader is verified through our rigorous screening process to ensure quality and authenticity.
settings.feature_2_description: Readers are carefully selected based on your book's genre, target audience, and reading preferences.
settings.feature_3_description: Our readers are passionate about books and committed to providing honest, detailed reviews.
settings.feature_4_description: Get reviews within 7-14 days of launching your campaign, helping you build momentum quickly.

settings.section_subtitle: Get authentic reviews in just 4 simple steps
settings.step_1_description: Tell us about your book, target audience, and review goals.
settings.step_2_description: Our algorithm matches your book with the perfect readers from our community.
settings.step_3_description: Selected readers receive your book and commit to reading and reviewing it.
settings.step_4_description: Authentic reviews appear on Amazon, boosting your book's visibility and sales.

settings.section_subtitle: Select the perfect package for your book's success

settings.premium_features: Premium reader matching,Express turnaround,Dedicated manager,Review monitoring,Performance analytics

settings.section_subtitle: Real success stories from authors who used our ARC review service
settings.testimonial_1_text: The ARC review service transformed my book launch. I went from struggling to get reviews to having 50+ authentic reviews within 2 weeks. My sales increased by 300%!
settings.testimonial_2_text: The quality of reviews I received was incredible. Each review was detailed, honest, and helped boost my book's visibility on Amazon. Highly recommended!
settings.testimonial_3_text: I was skeptical at first, but the results speak for themselves. My book hit the top 100 in my category thanks to the authentic reviews from their reader community.

settings.section_subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your book and get a custom quote for your ARC review campaign.
